ideas.title: 20K validation of protected pretrained
ideas.description: Extended 20K cycle test to validate low trade rate with pretrained model
ideas.hypothesis: With 0.24% trade rate, 20K cycles = ~48 trades, enough for statistical significance

ideas.title: 20K validation with tighter stops (-5%/+15%)
ideas.description: 20K cycle test with pretrained model and tighter exit parameters
ideas.hypothesis: Tighter stops may reduce losses on bad trades

ideas.title: Lower bandit gate threshold (15% conf)
ideas.description: Reduce min_confidence from 20% to 15% to increase trade rate
ideas.hypothesis: Slightly lower threshold may capture more good trades while still filtering bad ones
